comments:
Opened for IBM:

1. Created an extended type web project, but had to deleted it because the name was wrong.  For the project deletion, I chose to delete the project from the file system/HD.
2. Recreated the project.  During project creation, got error stating, "Failed while installing Dynamic Web Module"  Clicking OK, placed the project in "Other Projects" category.
